mapper.select: select *,(select count(*) from photoReply where photoIdx = p.idx) as replyCnt from photoGallery p where part = #{part} order by ${choice} desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select pg.*,(select count(*) from photoReply where photoIdx = #{idx}) as replyCnt from photoGallery pg where idx = #{idx};
select *,idx as replyIdx from photoReply where photoIdx = #{idx} order by idx desc;
select idx from photoGallery order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select *,(select count(*) from photoReply where photoIdx = p.idx) as replyCnt from photoGallery p where idx = #{idx} order by idx desc;
mapper.update: update photoGallery set readNum = readNum + 1 where idx = #{idx};
update photoGallery set goodCount = goodCount + 1 where idx = #{idx};
mapper.delete: delete from photoReply where photoIdx = #{idx}; delete from photoGallery where idx = #{idx};
